Class to manage the generic type of Entity
FlyHead
Class to manage the FlyHead enemy
GameManager
Class GameManger that manages the game status and its saves
GamePanel
GamePanel class that handles the game loop, player input, and rendering.
HUD
 
KeyHandler
The KeyHandler class implements KeyListener and handles keyboard input for the game It tracks the state of specific keys (W, S, A, D) and provides boolean flags to indicate key presses
Main
Class Main
ManageFile
Class MManageFile
ObjectManager
Class ObjectManager to manage the various aboject on the map
Player
Class Player that contains fields for handling animation frames, storing sprite images for different directions, and references to the game panel and key handler for input processing.
Sprite
Class Sprite to manage the sprite object
Title
Class Title that represents a map title with properties such as position, size, collision status, and sprite It is used to define tiles on the game map
TitleManager
Class TitleManager manages the game map and titles.
TitleManager.TitleType
The different type of title

UserController
Class UserController
UserView
Class UserView
Vector2
Class to manage double object
Window
The Window class extends JFrame and represents the main window of the game It sets up the window properties such as close operation, resizability, and title The class also provides a method for initializing the window's layout and visibility
